org.easymock

Annotation Type TestSubject


  • @Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Documented
public @interface TestSubject
    Annotation to set on a field so that EasyMockRunner or EasyMockSupport.injectMocks(Object) will inject mocks created with Mock on its fields.

    See EasyMockSupport.injectMocks(Object) for the injection rules.

    Since:
    3.2
    Author:
    Henri Tremblay
